item.title: Translator
item.description: Meet TFinnish, my primitive program for learning Finnish vocabulary. Select what sort of words you’d like to work on: Common words Orthodox words Submit init() document.getElementById("b1").addEventListener("keyup", event = { if (event.key !== "Enter") return; document.getElementById("b1").click(); event.preventDefault(); });
